sentences.en: All the newspapers really want to do is scoop the opposition.
sentences.cn: 所有报社真正想做的就是比对手抢先报道。

sentences.en: He continued throughout to restate his opposition to violence.
sentences.cn: 他一直不断重申他反对暴力。

sentences.en: He had accused three opposition members of corrupt practices.
sentences.cn: 他指控3名反对派成员营私舞弊。

sentences.en: He has gradually acquiesced to the demands of the opposition.
sentences.cn: 他渐渐顺从了反对派的要求。

sentences.en: He is confident in his ability to overcome all opposition with his personal charm.
sentences.cn: 他自信有能力以个人魅力来化解一切反对力量。

sentences.en: He reiterated his opposition to the creation of a central bank.
sentences.cn: 他重申了自己反对成立央行的立场。

sentences.en: Her opposition to abortion and feminism mark her as a convinced traditionalist.
sentences.cn: 她对堕胎和女权主义的反对态度表明她是个不折不扣的传统主义者。

sentences.en: His opposition acted as a goad to her determination to succeed.
sentences.cn: 他的反对反而刺激她坚定了取得成功的决心。

sentences.en: Ministers can equally credibly claim that the opposition is to blame.
sentences.cn: 部长们也能同样令人信服地宣称，反对派应该受到指责。

sentences.en: Much public opposition to the new law remained.
sentences.cn: 公众对这项新法律仍存在普遍的反对情绪。

sentences.en: Opposition leaders said that the elections had been tainted by corruption.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导人说，选举中存在舞弊现象。

sentences.en: Plans to turn the site into a £600 million leisure complex have met with stiff opposition.
sentences.cn: 将该处改造成造价六亿英镑的综合性休闲大楼的计划遭到了激烈的反对。

sentences.en: Poland provide the opposition for the Scots' last warm-up match at home.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在国内最后一场热身赛的对手是波兰队。

sentences.en: President Alan Garcia was barracked by the right wing opposition.
sentences.cn: 阿兰·加西亚总统遭右翼反对派喝倒彩。

sentences.en: Stewart has developed a tendency to mix it verbally with the opposition.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特现在变得只要和别人意见不合，就准备大吵一架。

sentences.en: Strong opposition resulted in rejection of the bill.
sentences.cn: 在强烈反对下这项议案遭到否决。

sentences.en: The main opposition leaders had been arrested or placed under house arrest.
sentences.cn: 主要反对派领导人都已经遭到逮捕或软禁。

sentences.en: The move has won the implacable opposition of many economists.
sentences.cn: 该提案遭到了许多经济学家的坚决反对。

sentences.en: The opposition leader has regularly discomfited him in parliament.
sentences.cn: 反对派领导人常搞得他在国会中下不来台。

sentences.en: The proposals have aroused the opposition of teachers.
sentences.cn: 这些建议引起了教师们的反对。

sentences.en: they found themselves &B{in opposition to} state policy.
sentences.cn: 他们发现他们的意见和国家政策完全相反。

sentences.en: Workers found themselves in opposition to local interests.
sentences.cn: 工人们发现自己与当地人的利益存在冲突。
